charinfo.name: Akimichi Chouza
charinfo.description: A Konoha jounin, a member of the Akimichi clan, and the father of Chouji, Chouza is a brave, wise man that instills great confidence in his allies. In a fight, Chouza uses his size to become a nuisance to his enemies while granting safety to his team.

abilities.name: Chain Bind
abilities.description: Chouza slows down an enemy, dealing 5 damage to them and lowering all physical and chakra damage they deal by 10 for 1 turn. Chouza's team will also gain 5 destructible defense.

abilities.name: Chouza Meat Tank
abilities.description: Chouza begins rolling for 3 turns, dealing 15 damage to one enemy and granting his team 10 destructible defense for 1 turn each turn. During this time, the damage lowering effect of 'Chain Bind' will last 1 additional turn on that enemy.

abilities.name: Partial-Size Smash
abilities.description: If used on an enemy, for 1 turn, the next non-mental harmful skill they use will be countered. If used on an ally, for 1 turn, the next non-mental harmful skill used on them will be countered. The countered enemy will receive 10 damage. This skill is invisible and ignores invulnerability.

abilities.name: Chouza Block
abilities.description: This skill makes Akimichi Chouza invulnerable for 1 turn.
